website_summaries.verdict: It’s rare to find a playset for such a low price, especially considering it’s the iconic Hall of Doom. This set is a fine fit for housing the Justice League’s many foes.
pros: Classic Hall of Doom playset for villains
Many hidden traps for catching heroes

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with, hope it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Its a great toy - my son loves this and the imaginext hall of justice from the same set (we have played with it so much that I am running out of story lines for taking over the universe). And the nostalgia value for someone that grew up watching the superfriends on Saturday mornings is priceless. However, gave 4 stars because the toy is made of really cheap plastic and ultimately it doesn't really do that much (although the hall of doom does more than the hall of justice). But for the price I guess one can't expect great build quality or a lot of bells and whistles. Good buy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for kids who love superheroes/ action figures
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our daughter's favorite toys for her superheroes/ action figures. She's a huge fan of the Imaginext toys. There is a lot to do with it, and the windows light up. We gave it to her when she was 7 and she still plays with it at age 9 as do her friends when they come over for play dates.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy N.

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: My son requested the Hall of Justice for Christmas. I saw this item was marked down on Amazon, so I thought this would be great to go along with it. The eyes opening up is a really fun feature. We have a few Imaginext Super Friends sets. This isn't the best of the bunch, but it is still a good set. I wish the top removed. We have the Gotham Jail and Superman playset. This is similar to the Superman set. It has some fun items, but not nearly as much as the jail. I still would purchase again at the price point I did. Not sure I would have paid the regular price.
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: Super Friends nostalgia at its finest, for our littlest DC fans?
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Imaginext playsets! I'm a thirty something parent, and LOVE this for the nostalgia of watching Super Friends and the campy, great HALL OF DOOM design. My three year old plays with this set more than any of the other Imaginext playsets, loving the elevator, eye mechanism, and other little gizmos. He gathers up all the villains to hang out in the HALL OF DOOM, then brings in the heroes to absolutely clean house.
customer_reviews.author: Frogking626

customer_reviews.title: Lots of moving parts for a young child's curiosity
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 3-1/2 year old grandson who loves these products. There are multiple moving parts to intrigue a boy of that age. My only complaint is that it is plastic and seems very cheaply made. I am not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Customer from Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Legion of Doom Headquarters is Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Another great addition to the DC Comics Imaginext toy line. My little guy loves all of these toys and this set is fun for me to see the old Legion of Doom headquarters as a toy. I would have loved something like this when I was kid. The set comes with good ol' Lex Luthor and has a spot to trap Batman/Superman as they battle it out. And at the price right, this thing is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: The Hall of Doom 😃
customer_reviews.text: Oh how I wish there were more Legion of Doom toys out there! This Hall of Doom is great.😃 I do hope that they make a bigger one in the future that does more. But for now, this is fun. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Once Upon A Time

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as what you normally expect from Imaginext
customer_reviews.text: This toy although already one of my sons favorites is extremely flimsy and not of the quality I expect from the Imaginext toys my boys have enjoyed for years. It does however have many ways of play and is a great thing to look at. My 4 year old loves it and the Lex Luther that comes with it. Perhaps not a good idea for overly rough kids though.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzymommy73

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for $9 :)
customer_reviews.text: We got this for less than $9 in the Amazon Outlet-- WOW! Quite a steal at this price. My kids love the Imaginext toys, and this is no exception. It has a lot of neat little features, like the eye windows that open and close and the little elevator. Plus it's much bigger than you'd think from the picture.
customer_reviews.author: MEB

customer_reviews.title: Another hit from Imaginext/DC
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing, Just what you might expect from the Imaginext toy line. Durable and great for 3+ year old kids. I hope they keep producing more super villians sets.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo HS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a kids birthday party and he said he likes it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very great addition to anyone's collection. The Hall lights up and has a trap door, snakes, a jail of sorts. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Great toyline! Not only a quality product, but so creative in it's design and function! Very popular with kids and collectors! No comparisons out there!!!
customer_reviews.author: Balls

customer_reviews.title: One of my son's favorite christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: One of my son's favorite christmas gifts. the ease to rip it out of the package was awesome. He could take it out himself and he is 5. The price was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Autumnsharp08

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy. It goes well with the imaginext justice ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. It goes well with the imaginext justice league series. It's not too big or bulky, it's a great size for kids and doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: dbazay

customer_reviews.title: Great price for such a fun-filled toy
customer_reviews.text: Great price for such a fun-filled toy! Comes with Lex and you can buy lots of others to play along. Great for DC loving kids!
customer_reviews.author: LindsMc1

customer_reviews.title: ... couldn't pass up because Amazon had it at an AMAZING price. My kids LOVE Imaginext toys
customer_reviews.text: Yet another product I couldn't pass up because Amazon had it at an AMAZING price. My kids LOVE Imaginext toys, so whenever I find a deal I jump on it. Imaginext toys are great quality and can definitely withstand some rough play. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan O'Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Imaginex at  a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson loves these Imaginext toys and he asked me for this one for Christmas. Less than $18 here is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Hedley W. Davies

customer_reviews.title: good addition to his other Imaginext caves
customer_reviews.text: my son loves it, not as big as some of his others, but didn't cost as much either
customer_reviews.author: Jacob D Harness

customer_reviews.title: Definite Buy
customer_reviews.text: My son is dying for this from Santa. Got this for an amazing price! Excited for him to open this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2One

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the Bad Guys!!!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this product. He plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: John M LoPresti

customer_reviews.title: Good imaginary gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good present. I checked around and Amazon was several dollars cheaper. It is a very good Imaginext toy.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA CAROLE WENZLER

customer_reviews.title: great quality DC Imaginext
customer_reviews.text: Another durable, great quality DC Imaginext. Countless hours are spent playing with our whole collection.
customer_reviews.author: arcflash family

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and was exactly as described. ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and was exactly as described. My grandson loves it!! Would definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Pentico

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to a DC Imaginext set. Not that great as a stand alone play set.
customer_reviews.author: I love Stuff

customer_reviews.title: It was a great deal.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this toy. It was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: I love it and I got an amazing price on it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it and I got an amazing price on it got to love amazon ....Will update after Christmas to tell what my little boy thought of it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Latosha Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like everything Imaginext this is a really cool set!
customer_reviews.author: Bran18

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my child. This has provided hours of fun and imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Some bad guys cannot fit in, but looks cool anyway.
customer_reviews.author: AlitoNet

customer_reviews.title: The canon is fragile broke after two days! Seems ...
customer_reviews.text: The canon is fragile broke after two days! Seems to be a trend with this brand as the hall of justice canons have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Colon

customer_reviews.title: Hall of Doom
customer_reviews.text: My son is going to love this on Christmas Day. Arrived very quickly with no problems. Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rosarita

customer_reviews.title: absolutely great product line
customer_reviews.text: Imaginext, absolutely great product line, my 3 year old son and I, we can't get enough of their toys!
customer_reviews.author: Olga Bazdyreva

customer_reviews.title: Meanwhile...
customer_reviews.text: It's the freaking Hall of Doom, of course it's 5 star. It was easily the favorite toy at the birthday party
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Joiner

customer_reviews.title: Imaginext Toys are Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: My great-nephews LOVE this toy!!! It's usually the first one out of the toy box and the last one to be put back in!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carin G Seward

customer_reviews.title: Great Lair For Bad Guys
customer_reviews.text: My boy and I bought this and we both love it. Lots of fun. The eyes open and when they do there is an LED light behind them that lights up. There is also a Lex Luther character that you can't get anywhere else. There is a lack of bad guy lairs and this fills a good gap. We did a video of us playing with it that will help you decide if you need it:
customer_reviews.author: McFatridge01

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to Imaginext DC Superfriends collection!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than I expected for the price, but lots of fun and interactive features that my son really enjoys. This is a great addition to the other Imaginext DC Super friends toys. A villain hideout definitely completes the set.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba's Momma

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Imaginext DC Super Friends, Hall of Doom
product_meta.description:
It’s the headquarters of the Legion of Doom, occupied by the evil Lex Luthor! Kids can turn Lex Luthor on the Power Pad at the entrance to raise and lower the elevator. Turning Lex Luthor on the top Power Pad transforms the entire Hall of Doom—the “eyes” open and light up, the hidden cannon is revealed and the cage drops ALL AT ONCE! The adventure continues on the back with all sorts of interesting sculpted details that help kids add to the story about Lex Luthor and the Legion of Doom spying on their foes!

BRAND STORY
By Fisher Price
feature_bullets: Turn Lex Luthor on disk at base to raise and lower elevator
Turn Lex Luthor on top disk for awesome transformation: "eyes" open and light up, platform spins to reveal hidden launcher and cage drops
Turn Lex Luthor to reveal the hidden cannon
Add to the story about Lex Luthor and the Legion of Doom spying on their foes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars137 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
